Invocation Name: international scrum assembly
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We will teach you the essentials of the Scrum Framework; a framework that is used to create innovative products and services. Scrum is based on a small set of core values, principles, techniques, and practices that collectively form the Scrum Framework.

Scrum is lightweight and simple to understand. Our book is meticulously designed to provide you with a step-by-step guide to the depths of Scrum Framework while retaining its inherent simplicity.

At the end of the day today, you will have learned everything you need to master the Scrum Framework, and you will be ready to pass the official Scrum Certification Exam.

In the spirit of open-sourced nature of Scrum, we are offering this copyrighted book to you and the Scrum community on our website for free. If you prefer the print version, it is available at online Amazon stores worldwide.
priv:
